bands.name: Linkin Park
bands.description: Alternative rock band that debuted in 1996. Original band members: Mike Shinoda, Rob Bourdon, and Brad Delson. Top 3 songs: Numb(2003), In The End(2000), and Faint(2003).

bands.name: Nirvana
bands.description: Grunge band that debuted in 1987. Original band members: Kurt Cobain, Krist Novoselic, and Dave Grohl. Top 3 songs: Smells Like Teen Spirit(1991), Heart-Shaped Box(1993), and Lithium(1991).

bands.name: Five Finger Death Punch
bands.audio-clip: ./assets/5 finger death punch - Made with Clipchamp (3).mp3
bands.description: Metal band that debuted in 2005. Original band memebers: Ivan Moody, Zolton Bathory, Caleb Andrew Bingham, Matt Snell, and Jeremy Spencer. Top 3 songs: The Bleeding(2005), Wrong Side of Heaven(2013), and Wash It All Away(2015).

bands.name: Snoop Dogg
bands.description: Rap/Reggae singer and song writer that debuted in 1991. Snoop Dogg's top 3 songs: Gin and Juice(1994), Nothin' But A G Thang(1992), and Drop It Like It's Hot(2004).

bands.name: Taylor Swift
bands.description: Pop/Country singer and song writer that debuted in 2006. Taylor Swift's top 3 songs: I Don't Wanna Live Forever(2016), Blank Space(2014), and Shake It Off(2004).
